scripts.build:ui: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rimraf server/dist && npm run build --prefix client && cp -r client/dist server/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m "UI Build" && git push
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run copy:client-to-server
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm install && npm run build
